name: Rewind Mechanic
description:
Whoever You are Please Don't Download this Game, There is not much in it, Even Mr. Asbjørn Thirslund Aka (Brackeys) Provided a Time Period of 7 Days, We Still can't Make it Through, But The Reason Why We are Submitting This Game for the Jam is Because, We Spend our Time on it to Learn and Try Something New even it's Non Executable at the End, As a Designer and Developer We are Ready to get Ashamed rather than Quitting. When We Learn and Ready to Execute what We were thinking, We Will Definitely Re Upload this Game as it Should Be! Thank You!

Controls:
W S A D for Movement
Space For Jump
Q for Time Forward, R for Rewind, E for Interaction
Alt+F4 For Quit
